    • Method Detail

      • copy

      • getPartition

        public static org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition getPartition(List<org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition> partitionList,
                                                                  com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubMessage message)
        Gets a TopicPartition from the given List for a particular PubSubMessage. For a given message and list of partitions, this method always picks the same partition.
        Parameters:
        partitionList - The List of TopicPartition.
        message - The PubSubMessage to deliver to one of the TopicPartition.
        Returns:
        A TopicPartition to use from the given partitions.

      • setRouteData

        public static void setRouteData(List<org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition> partitions,
                                com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubMessage message)
                         throws com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException
        Given a List of TopicPartition, set metadata required to route responses into the PubSubMessage. For a given message and list of partitions, this method always picks the same partition.
        Parameters:
        partitions - The List of TopicPartition.
        message - The PubSubMessage to set metadata to.
        Throws:
        com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException - if there were issues setting the metadata.

      • getRouteInfo

        public static org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition getRouteInfo(com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubMessage message)
                                                           throws com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException
        Given a PubSubMessage with routing data set by setRouteData(List, PubSubMessage), returns the routing data or TopicPartition set within it.
        Parameters:
        message - The PubSubMessage with routing data.
        Returns:
        The TopicPartition contained within.
        Throws:
        com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException - if there were issues getting the routing data.
